channel.title: Rc on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in Rc on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: PrestaShop 9.0 RC1 is now available!
item.description: The first Release Candidate of PrestaShop 9.0 is now available for testing. This is a significant milestone in the development cycle, and we encourage all users to test it thoroughly.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1 Release Candidate Is Ready To Be Tested!
item.description: We are happy to announce the first release candidate of PrestaShop 8.1.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.0 Release Candidate Is Ready To Be Tested!
item.description: The maintainers team is pleased to announce the first release candidate of PrestaShop 8.0.

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.8.0 RC1 Is Ready To Be Tested!
item.description: A few months after the beta, the first release candidate for PrestaShop 1.7.8.0 is now ready for you to test!

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.7.0 RC1 Is Ready To Be Tested!
item.description: We are really happy to announce that we are very close to finishing the 1.7.7.0 release, the release candidate is the last step before the final version is out.

item.title: Release note 1.7.6 RC2
item.description: Once again the PrestaShop community actively participated in the testing of the PrestaShop 1.7.6 Release Candidate. Thanks to your involvement, 3 regressions were identified and fixed.

item.title: Release note 1.7.6 RC1
item.description: This is the last step before releasing the final 1.7.6.0. It aims at making sure that all regressions found during the beta have been fixed, and that no new ones appeared. If no new regression is reported by July 1st, we will make the final version of 1.7.6.0 available.

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.3.0 RC1 is open for feedback!
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.3.0 Release Candidate is now ready for you to test!

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.0.0 RC3: Getting there!
item.description: We’re getting closer! With this new Release Candidate, we deliver a strong RC, which is closer than ever to our quality objectives.

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.0.0 RC2: On the Right Track
item.description: Another step in the right direction towards a stable v1.7, this RC2 fixes a lot of stuff and enhances some more.

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.0.0 RC1: The Real Deal
item.description: Here it comes: the bug fixin’, performance improvin’, stabilizin, all singin’ all dancin’ RC1 for PrestaShop 1.7! It is packed with goodness, and needs your love!

item.title: Recommended for testing: PrestaShop 1.7.0.0 RC0
item.description: Have you been waiting for a “stable enough” version of PrestaShop 1.7 in order to start truly testing this new major release? Well, consider yourself in luck, because today we are releasing the RC0 of PrestaShop – not quite a first RC, but close enough for you to start testing and provide us with the necessary feedback to make 1.7 a good fit for your needs!

item.title: Test PrestaShop 1.6.1.2 RC4
item.description: Today we are releasing the fourth Release Candidate version of version 1.6.1.2.

item.title: Test PrestaShop 1.6.1.2 RC3
item.description: We received quite a few feedback reports and pull-requests since we released v1.6.1.2 RC1 two weeks ago, so here’s the RC3, which fixes some more issues, and polishes a few more lines of code.

item.title: Test PrestaShop 1.6.1.2 RC1
item.description: As mentionned in the previous Core Weekly report, the team is working on version 1.6.1.2, which after v1.6.1.1 is the second patch version of 1.6.1.0.
